text: Marta Alejandra Cox Villarreal (born 20 July 1997) is a Panamanian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Costa Rican club LD Alajuelense and the Panama women's national team. ==International goals== Scores and results list Panama's goal tally first {| class="wikitable" |- !
